author: Nintendo of America
description:
Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition is now available on Nintendo Switch 2 & Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/tomb-raider-definitive-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01 

Experience the cinematic action-adventure that forced Lara Croft to grow from an inexperienced young woman into a hardened survivor. Lara must endure high-octane combat, customize her weapons and gear, and overcome grueling environments to survive her first adventure and uncover the island’s deadly secret. 

#NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 #TombRaider 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2 & Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide is out now on Nintendo Switch 2: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/spongebob-squarepants-titans-of-the-tide-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01 

A clash between the Flying Dutchman and King Neptune has unleashed ghostly mayhem all over Bikini Bottom! Switch seamlessly between SpongeBob and Patrick and combine their unique skills to battle epic bosses. Save Bikini Bottom in the duo's ghostliest adventure yet, fully voiced by the original show cast.  

#SpongeBobSquarePants #NintendoSwitch2  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s
